feed.title: Channel-Port aux Basques - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WRECKHOUSE WIND WARNING, Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:15 a.m. NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:17 a.m. NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -1.3°C
Wind: SW 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain or snow. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain late this evening. Blowing snow this evening. Fog patches overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 in the Wreckhouse area late this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of drizzle. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
